summary: This bill mandates biennial assessments of the nutrition standards of each military department. The Secretary of Defense will conduct these assessments, reviewing nutrition programs and food options available at military installations. The results will be reported to the House and Senate Armed Services Committees and published online. Additionally, the bill requires the Under Secretaries of Defense for Personnel and Readiness, and Acquisition and Sustainment, to submit a plan within 180 days to increase access to nutritious food on military installations, addressing recommendations from a Government Accountability Office report.
